meta_data.title: Acknowledgments, Appendices, SIGCHI Extended Abstracts, Research Methods, Online Resources
meta_data.abstract: This paper provides guidelines and examples for structuring various sections of a research paper, including acknowledgments, appendices, SIGCHI Extended Abstracts, research methods, and online resources.

relate work.related papers: Author Guidelines for Research Articles, Structured Metadata Extraction from Documents

high_level_summary.summary of this paper: This paper outlines the correct formatting and structuring of various sections commonly found in research papers, such as acknowledgments, appendices, SIGCHI extended abstracts, research methods, and online resources.
high_level_summary.research purpose: To provide a standard guideline for structuring specific sections within research papers.

Method.description: The paper provides templates and examples for authors to follow in properly structuring different sections of their research articles.

Experiments.evaluation metric: Qualitative assessment of clarity and reproducibility
Experiments.results: The proposed formatting templates improved clarity and ease of metadata extraction, as well as consistency in document presentation.

conclusion.summary: The structured templates provided guide authors in effectively presenting their research, improving metadata extraction, and maintaining document consistency.
